Text: Hello! Thanks a lot for this great torrent! These books are among my absolute favorites. Where can I get some more information about this audiobook, such as who is reading them and so on, and can anyone also tell me where I can find the e-books as a torrent?

thanks so much i love sword in the stone... haven't read the other ones after so this is going to be great. that book was the first fantasy i ever read and it blew me away, put me in another dimension! thanks
Awesome. Thank you very much. Downloaders should note, a large portion of fourth disc has flaws in the audio- the middle third or so fades in and out. Otherwise, excellent.
sorry, that's the fourth disc in the first book, "Sword In The Stone"
